:::

Average Precision (AP) and Area Under the Precision-Recall Curve (AU) between metrics and error spans derived from human post-editing. We use mBART 1-to-50 and NLLB 3B respectively for DivEMT and QE4PE. For DivEMT, a single post-editor is available for computing the agreement, while for QE4PE we use consensus-based [Oracle]{.smallcaps} highlights. For QE4PE, we report the average agreement between individual oracle post-editors and their consensus as an agreement upper bound.
:::
